column4: hello, i need some help getting sound to work; ubuntu 10.10, (i just upgraded from 10.04 where it didn't work either but the hdmi was not detected)
no sound over hdmi is your issue?
yes; i see the devices in aplay -l
but when i try to do the aplay test wav on each of them one by one.... no sound every comes out, and i have also un muted the devices in alsamixer
what is it like an nvidia card w/ hdmi output

so everything is unmuted and you are connecting the card to what device, and what are you using to test sound besides aplay. if you go to your speaker icon in task manager or however else you get to your settings make sure that you view the controls for every thing related to that hdmi (mine is an gf108 nvidia with just a master control.
i was trying to test with this method: aplay -D plughw:1,3 /usr/share/sounds/alsa/Front_Center.wav   also 1,7; 1,8; 1,9
in alsamixer do you have spdif options.
all are set to 00, not MM
the only output i have is the hdmi.... well i haven't tried testing the analog
and have you muted everything if you have an intel integrated sound chip or something.
i didn't actively mute the intel ones
i'd try it and disable any iec958 checkboxes for it
hmm kk; gonna pass out for now (2AM here) but i'll try it
